title: 5k?
body:
People who have 5k displays (aka iMac 27") or even 4k displays want to enjoy this game's resolution to the fullest, HOWEVER when you change league to 5120x2880 (yes, it's possible) the visuals are mindblowing, but the cursor becomes too small (can't make it larger), text becomes too small, the map AND the minions health bars become too small as well (aka u miss cs like crazy).
I just want riot to adjust these things accordingly. that's all. It shouldn't be too hard to just go on a 5k screen, and adjust the size of everything just the way it would look on a 1980x1080 screen. I'm currently using 2xxx x 1xxx resolution because if I put it any higher, the mouse becomes smaller, the health bars become smaller - aka it becomes unplayable. So in fact, I have to give up on quality just for the sake of gameplay. Why can't I have both? Q_Q

replies.body:
You're experiencing this because League doesn't have full support for higher resolutions such as the 4K and 5K examples you provided. I certainly don't have a timeline on when this will come out since I don't work on the teams that deploy these features, but I recommend keeping an eye on the [**News Page**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) for any sort of official announcement regarding it.

Let me know if you have any questions.
